FuncDef: The display cpu-defend car cross-board statistics command displays statistics about inter-board traffic CAR.
CLIs: display cpu-defend car cross-board statistics slot <slot-id>
Examples: <HUAWEI> display cpu-defend car cross-board statistics slot 1
Configured CIR : 10240     kbps       Actual CIR in NP : 10240     kbps
Configured CBS : 7680000   bytes      Actual CBS in NP : 7680000   bytes
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After CAR is configured for inter-board trunk packets and inter-board packets on the dumb terminal, to check the statistics about inter-board traffic CAR, run the display cpu-defend car cross-board statistics command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
